document_data.mainbody:
The Green Altar was a shrine dedicated to Silvanus the Oak Father, in the city of Tilverton in Cormyr.
The Green Altar stood on a landing along the southern Tilver Stairs on the Street of the Sorceress, that connected the citys lower city and the Old Town. Climbing the long stair was the only way to access the landing, where a garden encircled the shrine consecrated by the Church of Silvanus.
